description: After Akihisa seeks Kouta`s advice on how to deal with a troubling blackmail note, he learns that Yuuji is in a similar situation. Kouta`s investigation uncovers clues that suggest one person is causing all of the problems.

titles.title: Boku to Nozoki to Kyouka Gasshuku!
Eu, Espiar E O Campo De Treinamento!
僕とのぞきと強化合宿っ!
